titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on footwear for women (other than house slippers, tennis shoes, basketball shoes, gym shoes, training shoes and the like and other than work footwear), valued $15/pair or higher.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/26/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on footwear for women (other than house slippers, tennis shoes, basketball shoes, gym shoes, training shoes and the like and other than work footwear), valued $15/pair or higher.
